page.title: 19THE SCHOOL SPRING FAIR.
page.content: For a number of years the School's {Parents' Association}has organised a {Spring Fair}as a means of raising funds to purchase expensive items of equipment which are not affordable using the annual school allowance, e.g. video recorder, computer, etc. As well as the usual{stalls -}cakes, fruit & vegetables,books,bric-a-brac, crafts,etc. and{sideshows}- skittles, darts, roll-a-2p,lucky-dip,bowls, etc. an{inter-school competition}is held. Several local schools of similar size (Calveley, Tattenhall, Duddon, Acton, Huxley) are invited to send a team of ten children (girls & boys) to compete in a number of team fun-games,usually five.The last game is always a water game and is the most popular! At the end of the events the winning team is presented with a shield which the school holds for one year.
